title: Incorrect code removal due to faulty code analysis?
body:
Starting with v0.59.0, I have run into a case where code is being incorrectly omitted in the output. It looks like rollup is trying to remove code it thinks is unreachable, but using a faulty analysis that is insensitive to the `new` operator (for example, when assignments are happening within a constructor).

Here is a [simple reproduction](https://rollupjs.org/repl?version=0.59.2&).
